name: WHEN I HEAR COLOURS IN MY MIND
description: can you hear colours? can you taste sound? psychedelics are shown to act on the brain diminishing barriers between parts that usually don't communicate with each other, opening up possibilities to experience not only synesthesia but also expanded creativity. this is a synesthesic audiovisual abstraction. video: feedback loop of digital modular synth, audio: slowed down virtual glockenspiel. 960x1280 px, mp4, 2021.
